modShortDescription: Fixed immersion for all blocks to degrade after looting.
modDescription:
Fixed immersion for all blocks to degrade after looting.

## Changelog

* **1.6** Fixed cupboards/cabinet to downgrade correctly.
* **1.5** Fixed warning and infinite loops.
* **1.4** Add Wood and Metal Desk
* **1.3** Added Kitchen Assets
* **1.2** Added Grills
* **1.1** Added Store Shelves
* **1.0** All blocks degrade with looting.

**Disclaimer:** Kronons got inspiration for this mod from Stallionsden.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1Ira0ZEDfjf5EtIEm9-HiVcdlj1K1taw8)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19905-aio-fix-immersion-for-all-blocks/).

**Credits:** [Kronons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/kronons/)
